reviews.review: its a really fun game to play as a team with other online players.
O jogo é bom se você não ligar para os servers ruins e a quantidade surpreendente de hackers.
muy buen juego, se lleva casi todas mis horas libres xD

A really good game, would recommend to others, has a high skill ceiling for those wanting to see improvements, yeah there might be cheaters every now and then, but usually if you are in prime or high trust factor, you shouldn't encounter a lot of cheaters.

oh and also, don't open crates...Just don't...

the game is not so beginner friendly so just understand that when you do install CSGO, know that at the start you will have a very tuff time but once that tuff time goes away you will actually enjoy the game
